title: TransactionEventStage
description:
TransactionEventStage is an XDR Enum defines as:

```text enum TransactionEventStage { // The event has happened before any one of the transactions has its // operations applied. TRANSACTION_EVENT_STAGE_BEFORE_ALL_TXS = 0, // The event has happened immediately after operations of the transaction // have been applied. TRANSACTION_EVENT_STAGE_AFTER_TX = 1, // The event has happened after every transaction had its operations // applied. TRANSACTION_EVENT_STAGE_AFTER_ALL_TXS = 2 }; ```
